name: bKash
description: bKash enables secure mobile payments for services listed on our platform, making transactions smooth and accessible.

name: Nagad
description: Nagad partners with us to offer instant digital payment solutions, helping users pay or receive money with ease.

name: Pathao
description: Pathao supports our platform by offering fast delivery and ride-sharing options for service providers and clients alike.

name: Shohoz
description: Shohoz collaborates with us to help users book tickets and services for events or experiences they discover through TrueReview.

name: Daraz
description: Daraz brings eCommerce power to our ecosystem by offering verified sellers and product-based service integrations.

name: Sheba.xyz
description: Sheba.xyz connects TrueReview users with local service professionals, from cleaning to appliance repair and more.

name: Chaldal
description: Chaldal helps us enable fast delivery of daily essentials through trusted logistics and vendor partnerships.

name: AjkerDeal
description: AjkerDeal supports our platform by providing a broad range of Bangladeshi local products and seller services.
